testcase.name: create cat
testcase.system-out: * url demoBaseUrl ......................................................... passed Given path 'cats' ......................................................... passed And param foo = 'bar' ..................................................... passed And request { name: 'Billie' } ............................................ passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == { id: '#number', name: 'Billie' } ................... passed * def temp = karate.prevRequest ........................................... passed * def requestMethod = temp.method ......................................... passed * match requestMethod == 'POST' ........................................... passed * def requestHeaders = temp.headers ....................................... passed * def contentType = temp.headers['Content-Type'][0] ....................... passed * match contentType contains 'application/json' ........................... passed * match contentType contains 'charset=UTF-8' .............................. passed * def requestUri = temp.uri ............................................... passed * match requestUri == demoBaseUrl + '/cats?foo=bar' ....................... passed * def requestBody = temp.body ............................................. passed * def requestString = new java.lang.String(requestBody, 'utf-8') .......... passed * match requestString == '{"name":"Billie"}' .............................. passed
